class_notes:
1L elective and upper level
This course will explore the constitutional and statutory framework for federal agency rulemaking and adjudication, and the bases for review of these agency actions by the Judiciary.
sections: Class Nbr: 1900, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10:30a-12p, Instructor: R. Marcovitch, Status: Open
